api/jobs.title: Jobs API
api/jobs.description: The Jobs API allows you to programmatically submit, monitor, and manage compute jobs across multiple DePIN networks.

api/overview.title: API Overview
api/overview.description: Cortex provides a comprehensive REST API that allows you to programmatically manage jobs, providers, and resources across multiple DePIN networks.

api/providers.title: Providers API
api/providers.description: The Providers API allows you to configure, manage, and monitor DePIN network providers in your Cortex instance.

api/webhooks.title: Webhooks API
api/webhooks.description: The Webhooks API allows you to configure event notifications for your Cortex instance, enabling real-time integration with external systems.

architecture/atomic-commitment.title: Atomic Commitment Protocol
architecture/atomic-commitment.description: Cortex implements a robust atomic commitment protocol to ensure data consistency across distributed DePIN networks. This document explains how Cortex maintains transaction integrity when working with multiple decentralized systems.

architecture/overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: Cortex is designed as a modular, extensible platform for orchestrating compute workloads across decentralized physical infrastructure networks (DePINs). This document provides a high-level overview of the Cortex architecture.

architecture/security.title: Security Architecture
architecture/security.description: Cortex is designed with security as a foundational principle. This document outlines the security architecture of the Cortex platform and the measures implemented to protect your data and infrastructure.

getting-started/first-job.title: Your First Job
getting-started/first-job.description: This guide walks you through submitting your first computational job on Cortex, explaining each step in detail.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation Guide
getting-started/installation.description: This guide walks you through installing and configuring Cortex on your local machine or server.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start Guide
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get your first job running on Cortex in under 5 minutes.

guide/cost-optimization.title: Cost Optimization
guide/cost-optimization.description: This guide covers strategies and best practices for optimizing costs when using Cortex to manage decentralized compute workloads.

guide/dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
guide/dashboard.description: The Cortex Dashboard provides a centralized interface for monitoring and managing your decentralized compute operations. This guide walks you through the key components and features of the dashboard.

guide/job-management.title: Job Management
guide/job-management.description: This guide covers advanced job management features in Cortex, including job lifecycle, monitoring, troubleshooting, and automation.

guide/network-providers.title: Network Providers
guide/network-providers.description: This guide covers the DePIN network providers supported by Cortex, their unique features, configuration requirements, and best practices for each.

intro.title: Introduction to Cortex
intro.description: Welcome to Cortex, the multi-DePIN orchestration platform that makes decentralized computing accessible to everyone.

troubleshooting/common-issues.title: Common Issues
troubleshooting/common-issues.description: This guide covers common issues you might encounter when using Cortex and provides troubleshooting steps to resolve them.

troubleshooting/debugging.title: Debugging Techniques
troubleshooting/debugging.description: This guide covers advanced debugging techniques to help you diagnose and resolve complex issues in your Cortex deployment.

troubleshooting/support.title: Getting Support
troubleshooting/support.description: This guide outlines the various support options available for Cortex users, from self-service resources to enterprise support plans.
